release.description: This release of the Web Grid Product Server addresses a couple of issues found in the previous release and moves the project to the PDS source repository.
release.action: Created this new project based on a combination of the OODT pds-ps (2.0.3) and pds-web-ps (2.0.3) packages migrated from the OODT source repository. The package has a dependency on OODT web-grid (1.4.0).
Modified the dependencies and the unit tests to correct an issue encountered with saving configuration changes.

Modified the FileQueryHandler class to detect the existence of "../" in the file name specification and reject the query as a non-OFSN query. This will restrict the ability to traverse up the directory tree.
